title: Old-Style Mustard and Rosemary Asparagus Recipe
full_text:
Old-Style Mustard and Rosemary Asparagus Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
15 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
20 mins
Serves
2
to 4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
12
ounces
asparagus
, trimmed and halved
2
teaspoons
olive oil
1
teaspoon
grain mustard
1/2
teaspoon chopped
fresh rosemary
Zest
of
1/4
lemon
Salt
and pepper to taste
Directions
Preheat the oven to 425°F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the asparagus with all the other other ingredients on the baking sheet until combined. Roast for 10 to 12 minutes. Serve immediately.
